summary:
## Web Browsers: Your Gateway to the Web

A web browser, like Safari, is a program that lets you view websites. It fetches web page files from servers and shows them on your screen.  Almost everyone uses browsers, mostly on phones and computers. Google Chrome is the most popular one, but Safari is a close second. 

Remember, you need a browser to use the internet, but it's different from a search engine, which helps you find websites.
title: Web browser
